name: Savory Cold Mango Soup
keywords: ancho chili powder, mango, mint leaves, unsweetened coconut milk, yogurt, appetizer, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 4 to 6 ripe mangoes, peeled, pitted and chopped, or 4 cups frozen mango, thawed
1 tablespoon ancho or other mild chili powder, or to taste
1/4 cup chopped fresh mint leaves, plus a few sprigs, for garnish, optional

recipeInstructions.text: Purée mango in food processor or blender, adding enough milk to let the machine easily do its work. (Work in batches, if necessary.) Add the remaining milk, the yogurt, coconut milk, chili powder and cayenne, and process until smooth. Taste and adjust seasoning.
Transfer soup to bowl and refrigerate 1 hour. Ladle into bowls, garnish and serve.
